prompts: Create a unique Pokemon that can blend into its surroundings with a calm demeanor.
Imagine a psychic-type Pokemon that has a large, round body and a soothing smile.
Show me a Pokemon that can absorb attacks and reflects energy back at its opponents.
Generate a creature with a soft blue color that evokes a sense of tranquility and peace.
Design a Pokemon known for its resilience and determination, with an amusingly simple appearance.
Give me a quirky Pokemon that looks like a blue blob but has a deep psychic power.
Make a Pokemon that stands out with its unique tail and gentle expression.
